content: lovely lace fingerless victorian-like gloves inspired by a romantic soul i wanted to make a lovely lace pattern to complete in a short amount of time and still get that satisfaction for lace really beautiful in white as accessorie for wedding worked up in soft alpaca yarn these are both stretchy comfortable and luxurious how about working them up in some of your glitter yarn i only used half a skein for one set so you may have some lefterovers in your stash to fit just this project there s a link to the youtube tutorial in the pattern pdf happy crocheting -
